name: Locus Igni
description:
Locus Igni is a final project of a group of 4 person in first years at e-artsup. It was made in 2 month.

The game deals with a starship which is invaded by alien. You play the last survivor of the ship take your flammethrower and go to kill the alien to escape the ship.

The controls of the game use ZQD to move and the directionnal keys to fire with the flammethrower. You have an impulsion when firing in a direction.

Music use for the project :

-neo western by Kevin Macleod

-phantom from space by Kevin Macleod

-Heaven and hell by Jeremy Blake
